description: T.4 Oak - 2-3m Holistic crown reduction providing 2m clearance from house, crown lift to 4m from ground level and deadwood.T.5 Maple  - 20% Crown reshape, crown lift to 4m from ground level and deadwood.T.6-T.9 Lime - 5-7m Holistic crown reduction to historic points.T.10 Sycamore - 20% Crown reshape, crown lift to 4m from ground level and deadwood.G.11 Western Red Cedar - Remove 5 trees to allow remaining 4 trees and 2 Laburnum to flourish.
